Metadata.Title: Web Sites Are Located on a Non-system Partition
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that the web sites are not located in the default \inetpub\wwwroot directory. It should be on a non-system partition.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
